Class AppMethod

Namespace
WinFormsApp2
Assembly
WinFormsApp2.dll

Represents the "Method" command, used to define a method in the program. Inherits from BOOSE.Method.

public class AppMethod : Method, ICommand

Constructors

AppMethod()

Initializes a new instance of the AppMethod class. Resets the count to 0 during initialization by calling ResetCount(int).

public AppMethod()

Methods

Execute()

Executes the method by invoking the base class's Execute() method. After execution, resets the internal static count to 0 in the BOOSE.Boolean class.

public override void Execute()

ResetCount(int)

Resets the static count in the BOOSE.Boolean class by accessing its private static field "뇀".

public void ResetCount(int newVal)

Parameters

The new value to set for the static count field "뇀".

Exceptions
